system.description: By manipulating visual light, the character creates a moving hologram.
system.effect: An area up to 5 spaces wide per the character's rank-centered on anything the character wishes, within 50 spacesâ€”is filled with inky darkness. Those inside it cannot see anything, and no lights work within it except those generated by powers. The character must remain within 50 spaces of the affected area to avoid breaking concentration.
